name: The Rune Magician
description:
The Rune Magician is a puzzle mobile ( Android tablet ) game made with Unity 3D between April and May 2018.

The speech is : You play a swordman who have to go through a city to find the one who control all monsters. You can choose between kill or make ally of monsters and ennemies, every choice will have consequences

This project is a puzzle game with a specificity, his battle-system which use the Scrabble mechanics to use a spell and a QTE to cast it on ennemies.

In this project i made some battle features and a very important part of the integration.

This project was made to confirm my first year in my Bachelor Game-Design and Creative Coding in E-Artsup.
